content: this happy little **donut** 1 can now be yours crochet it for the play kitchen or as a decoration for the children s room it can be crocheted in any colors you want and it works up to be about 8 x 8 cm in size enjoy **level ** beginner **crochet hook ** 2 5 mm **materials ** small remnants of yarn in various colors for sprinkles black embroidery thread filling stitch markers size 6 mm safety eyes sewing needle **yarn ** *rainbow glitter gold* petunia pink gold #087 - 1 skein white gold #001 - 1 skein *rainbow glitter silver* baby purple silver #067 - 1 skein *rainbow cotton 8/4* almond #89 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** st stitch chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet 1 increase crochet 2 single_crochet into same stitch 1 decrease crochet 2 stitches together sl slip_stitch 1 https //hobbii com/kawaii-donut utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=kawaii-donut+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
